verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that after <S%G5613><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> were gotten <S%G645><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and had launched <S%G321><s%>, we came <S%G2064><s%> with a straight course <S%G2113><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Coos <S%G2972><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the day following <S%G1836><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Rhodes <S%G4499><s%>, and from thence <S%G2547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Patara <S%G3959><s%>:
And <S%G2532><s%> finding <S%G2147><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> sailing over <S%G1276><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Phenicia <S%G5403><s%>, we went aboard <S%G1910><s%>, and set forth <S%G321><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when we had discovered <S%G398><s%> Cyprus <S%G2954><s%> <S%G2532><s%>, we left <S%G2641><s%> it <S%G846><s%> on the left hand <S%G2176><s%>, and sailed <S%G4126><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Syria <S%G4947><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> landed <S%G2609><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G1566><s%> the ship <S%G4143><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> to unlade <S%G670><s%> her burden <S%G1117><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> finding <S%G429><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, we tarried <S%G1961><s%> there <S%G847><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>: who <S%G3748><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Paul <S%G3972><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, that he should <S%G305><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> had <S%G1096><s%> accomplished <S%G1822><s%> those days <S%G2250><s%>, we departed <S%G1831><s%> and went our way <S%G4198><s%>; and they all <S%G3956><s%> brought <S%G4311><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> on our way <S%G4311><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> we were out of <S%G1854><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> we kneeled down <S%G5087><s%> <S%G1119><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the shore <S%G123><s%>, and prayed <S%G4336><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when we had taken our leave <S%G782><s%> one of another <S%G240><s%>, we took <S%G1910><s%> <S%G1519><s%> ship <S%G4143><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> <S%G1519><s%> home <S%G2398><s%> again <S%G5290><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when we <S%G2249><s%> had finished <S%G1274><s%> our course <S%G4144><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%>, we came <S%G2658><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ptolemais <S%G4424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saluted <S%G782><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, and abode <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> them <S%G846><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the next <S%G1887><s%> day we that were of <S%G4012><s%> Paul's <S%G3972><s%> company <S%G4012><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> we entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of Philip <S%G5376><s%> the evangelist <S%G2099><s%>, which was <S%G5607><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%>; and abode <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> the same man <S%G5129><s%> had <S%G2258><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> daughters <S%G2364><s%>, virgins <S%G3933><s%>, which did prophesy <S%G4395><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as we <S%G2257><s%> tarried <S%G1961><s%> there many <S%G4119><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, there came down <S%G2718><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%>, named <S%G3686><s%> Agabus <S%G13><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he was come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> <S%G2532><s%>, he took <S%G142><s%> Paul's <S%G3972><s%> girdle <S%G2223><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, Thus <S%G3592><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, So <S%G3779><s%> shall <S%G1210><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> the man <S%G435><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> owneth <S%G2076><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> girdle <S%G2223><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall deliver <S%G3860><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> we <S%G2249><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they of that place <S%G1786><s%>, besought <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> mean ye <S%G4160><s%> to weep <S%G2799><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to break <S%G4919><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to be bound <S%G1210><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G2532><s%> also <S%G235><s%> to die <S%G599><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> would <S%G3982><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be persuaded <S%G3982><s%>, we ceased <S%G2270><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%>, The will <S%G2307><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> we took up our carriages <S%G643><s%>, and went up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>There went <S%G4905><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> certain of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>, and brought <S%G71><s%> with them <S%G3844><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> Mnason <S%G3416><s%> of Cyprus <S%G2953><s%>, an old <S%G744><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%>, with whom <S%G3739><s%> we should lodge <S%G3579><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> when we <S%G2257><s%> were come <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, the brethren <S%G80><s%> received <S%G1209><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> gladly <S%G780><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the day following <S%G1966><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> went in <S%G1524><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> James <S%G2385><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> were present <S%G3854><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had saluted <S%G782><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, he declared <S%G1834><s%> particularly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G1538><s%> what things <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> had wrought <S%G4160><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> it, they glorified <S%G1392><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Thou seest <S%G2334><s%>, brother <S%G80><s%>, how many <S%G4214><s%> thousands <S%G3461><s%> of Jews <S%G2453><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they are <S%G5225><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> they are informed <S%G2727><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou teachest <S%G1321><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> which are among <S%G2596><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to <S%G575><s%> forsake <S%G646><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> ought <S%G4059><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to circumcise <S%G4059><s%> their children <S%G5043><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> to walk <S%G4043><s%> after the customs <S%G1485><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>? the multitude <S%G4128><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> needs <S%G3843><s%> come together <S%G4905><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they will hear <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou art come <S%G2064><s%>.

Do <S%G4160><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%>: We <S%G2254><s%> have <S%G1526><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> men <S%G435><s%> which have <S%G2192><s%> a vow <S%G2171><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G1438><s%>;

Them <S%G5128><s%> take <S%G3880><s%>, and purify thyself <S%G48><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be at charges <S%G1159><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may shave <S%G3587><s%> their heads <S%G2776><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that those things <S%G3754><s%>, whereof <S%G3739><s%> they were informed <S%G2727><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, are <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that thou thyself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> walkest orderly <S%G4748><s%>, and keepest <S%G5442><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.

As <S%G1161><s%> touching <S%G4012><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> which believe <S%G4100><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> have written <S%G1989><s%> and concluded <S%G2919><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> observe <S%G5083><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> such thing <S%G5108><s%>, save only <S%G1508><s%> that they keep <S%G5442><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> from <S%G5037><s%> things offered to idols <S%G1494><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from blood <S%G129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from strangled <S%G4156><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from fornication <S%G4202><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> the men <S%G435><s%>, and the next <S%G2192><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> purifying himself <S%G48><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1524><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, to signify <S%G1229><s%> the accomplishment <S%G1604><s%> of the days <S%G2250><s%> of purification <S%G49><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> an offering <S%G4376><s%> should be offered <S%G4374><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> were almost <S%G3195><s%> ended <S%G4931><s%>, the Jews <S%G2453><s%> which were of <S%G575><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>, when they saw <S%G2300><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, stirred up <S%G4797><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

Crying out <S%G2896><s%>, Men <S%G435><s%> of Israel <S%G2475><s%>, help <S%G997><s%>: This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>, that teacheth <S%G1321><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men every where <S%G3837><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>: and <S%G5037><s%> further <S%G2089><s%> brought <S%G1521><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath polluted <S%G2840><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>.

(For <S%G1063><s%> they had <S%G2258><s%> seen before <S%G4308><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> Trophimus <S%G5161><s%> an Ephesian <S%G2180><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> they supposed <S%G3543><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> had brought <S%G1521><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>.)

And <S%G5037><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was moved <S%G2795><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> ran together <S%G1096><s%> <S%G4890><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they took <S%G1949><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, and drew <S%G1670><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G1854><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> forthwith <S%G2112><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> were shut <S%G2808><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as they went about <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, tidings <S%G5334><s%> came <S%G305><s%> unto the chief captain <S%G5506><s%> of the band <S%G4686><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> was in an uproar <S%G4797><s%>.

Who <S%G3739><s%> immediately <S%G1824><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> soldiers <S%G4757><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> centurions <S%G1543><s%>, and ran down <S%G2701><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> the chief captain <S%G5506><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%>, they left <S%G3973><s%> beating <S%G5180><s%> of Paul <S%G3972><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the chief captain <S%G5506><s%> came near <S%G1448><s%>, and took <S%G1949><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G2753><s%> him to be bound with <S%G1210><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> chains <S%G254><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> demanded <S%G4441><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> he was <S%G302><s%> <S%G1498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> he had <S%G2076><s%> done <S%G4160><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G243><s%> cried <S%G994><s%> one thing <S%G5100><s%>, some another <S%G243><s%>, among <S%G1722><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> when he could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> the certainty <S%G804><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the tumult <S%G2351><s%>, he commanded <S%G2753><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to be carried <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the castle <S%G3925><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he came <S%G1096><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the stairs <S%G304><s%>, so it was <S%G4819><s%>, that he was borne <S%G941><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the violence <S%G970><s%> of the people <S%G3793><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> followed after <S%G190><s%>, crying <S%G2896><s%>, Away <S%G142><s%> with him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> as Paul <S%G3972><s%> was to be <S%G3195><s%> led <S%G1521><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the castle <S%G3925><s%>, he said <S%G3004><s%> unto the chief captain <S%G5506><s%>, May <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1832><s%> I <S%G3427><s%> speak <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5100><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> <S%G1161><s%>? Who <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G5346><s%>, Canst thou speak <S%G1097><s%> Greek <S%G1676><s%>?

Art <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G686><s%> that Egyptian <S%G124><s%>, which before <S%G4253><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> madest an uproar <S%G387><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> leddest out <S%G1806><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> four thousand <S%G5070><s%> men <S%G435><s%> that were murderers <S%G4607><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G3303><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> which am a Jew <S%G2453><s%> of Tarsus <S%G5018><s%>, a city in Cilicia <S%G2791><s%>, a citizen <S%G4177><s%> of no <S%G3756><s%> mean <S%G767><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%>, I beseech <S%G1189><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, suffer <S%G2010><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he had given <S%G2010><s%> him <S%G846><s%> licence <S%G2010><s%>, Paul <S%G3972><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the stairs <S%G304><s%>, and beckoned <S%G2678><s%> with the hand <S%G5495><s%> unto the people <S%G2992><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> when there was made <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> silence <S%G4602><s%>, he spake <S%G4377><s%> unto them in the Hebrew <S%G1446><s%> tongue <S%G1258><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,
